attributes.action: announce formally ( a five minute TV/Radio broadcast in prime time) the new cabinet
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We need a premium league team to deal with the UK/Global issues. The PM has announced the premium team.
Let us deal with the major issues, the UK economy being the first one.There are excellent championship players such as Mr Cameron, Mr Clegg and their time will come later.

rejection.details: The Cabinet was announced on June 5 and the subsequent press conference was televised. Details of the new Cabinet can also be found here: http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page19531
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
